verses.verse: <S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> It is <S%G418>impossible<s%> but that <S%G4625>offenses<s%> will <S%G2064>come:<s%> but woe <S%G3759><s%> to him, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they come! <S%G2064><s%>

It were <S%G3081>better<s%> for him that a millstone <S%G3458><s%> <S%G3684><s%> were <S%G4029>hanged<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> his <S%G5137>neck,<s%> and he <S%G4496>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> that he should <S%G4624>offend<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3398>little<s%> ones.

Take <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves:<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G264>trespass<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> you, <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> him; and <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G3340>repent,<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> him.

And <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G264>trespass<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> you <S%G2034>seven<s%> <S%G2034>times<s%> in a <S%G2250>day,<s%> and <S%G2034>seven<s%> <S%G2034>times<s%> in a <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G1994>again<s%> to you, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G3340>repent;<s%> you shall <S%G863>forgive<s%> him.
And the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4369>Increase<s%> our <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> as a <S%G2848>grain<s%> of <S%G4615>mustard<s%> seed, you might <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4807>sycamine<s%> tree, Be you <S%G1610>plucked<s%> up by the <S%G1610>root,<s%> and be you <S%G5452>planted<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and it should <S%G5219>obey<s%> you.

But <S%G5101>which<s%> of you, <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G722>plowing<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4165>feeding<s%> <S%G4165>cattle,<s%> will <S%G2046>say<s%> to him by and by, when he is <S%G1525>come<s%> from the <S%G68>field,<s%> <S%G3928>Go<s%> and <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> to meat?

And will not rather <S%G2046>say<s%> to him, <S%G2090>Make<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> with <S%G5101>which<s%> I may <S%G1172>sup,<s%> and <S%G4024>gird<s%> yourself, and <S%G1247>serve<s%> me, <S%G2193>till<s%> I have <S%G5315>eaten<s%> and <S%G4095>drunken;<s%> and afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> you shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> and drink? <S%G4095><s%>
Does he thank <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5485><s%> that <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%> the things that were <S%G1299>commanded<s%> him? I <S%G1380>trow<s%> not.

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> you, <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall have <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G1299>commanded<s%> you, <S%G3004>say,<s%> We are <S%G888>unprofitable<s%> <S%G1401>servants:<s%> we have <S%G4160>done<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> was our <S%G3784>duty<s%> to do. <S%G4160><s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as he <S%G4198>went<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> that he <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of <S%G4540>Samaria<s%> and <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

And as he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2968>village,<s%> there <S%G528>met<s%> him <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> that were <S%G3015>lepers,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G4207>afar<s%> off:
And they <S%G142>lifted<s%> up their <S%G5456>voices,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1988>Master,<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on us.

And when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> them, he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>Go<s%> <S%G1925>show<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to the priests. <S%G2409><s%> And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that, as they <S%G5217>went,<s%> they were <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he was <S%G2390>healed,<s%> <S%G5290>turned<s%> <S%G5290>back,<s%> and with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>
And <S%G4098>fell<s%> down <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G3844>at<s%> his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> giving him <S%G2168>thanks:<s%> and he was a <S%G4541>Samaritan.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Were there not <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2511>cleansed?<s%> but where <S%G4226><s%> are the nine? <S%G1767><s%>
There are not <S%G2147>found<s%> that <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> stranger. <S%G241><s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G450>Arise,<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> your way: your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> you whole. <S%G4982><s%>

And when he was <S%G1905>demanded<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G4218>when<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G2064>come,<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> them and <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> not with observation: <S%G3907><s%>

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> shall they <S%G2046>say,<s%> <S%G2400>See<s%> <S%G5602>here!<s%> <S%G2228>or,<s%> <S%G2400>see<s%> <S%G1563>there!<s%> for, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1787>within<s%> you.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> The <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> you shall <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> of the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> and you shall not see <S%G3700><s%> it.

And they shall <S%G2046>say<s%> to you, <S%G2400>See<s%> <S%G5602>here;<s%> <S%G2228>or,<s%> <S%G2400>see<s%> <S%G1563>there:<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> not after them, <S%G3364>nor<s%> follow <S%G1377><s%> them.

For as the <S%G796>lightning,<s%> that <S%G797>lightens<s%> out of the one part <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2989>shines<s%> to the other part <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be in his day. <S%G2250><s%>
But <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> he <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things, and be <S%G593>rejected<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>
And as it was in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G3575>Noe,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall it be <S%G2532>also<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

They did <S%G2068>eat,<s%> they <S%G4095>drank,<s%> they <S%G1060>married<s%> wives, they were given in <S%G1548>marriage,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> that <S%G3575>Noe<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2787>ark,<s%> and the <S%G2627>flood<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G622>destroyed<s%> them all. <S%G537><s%>

<S%G3668>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> as it was in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G3091>Lot;<s%> they did <S%G2068>eat,<s%> they <S%G4095>drank,<s%> they <S%G59>bought,<s%> they <S%G4453>sold,<s%> they <S%G5452>planted,<s%> they built; <S%G3618><s%>

But the same <S%G2250>day<s%> that <S%G3091>Lot<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out of <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> it <S%G1026>rained<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all. <S%G537><s%>
Even thus <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5023><s%> shall it be in the <S%G2250>day<s%> when the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is revealed. <S%G601><s%>

In that <S%G2250>day,<s%> he <S%G3739>which<s%> shall be on the <S%G1430>housetop,<s%> and his <S%G4632>stuff<s%> in the <S%G3614>house,<s%> let him not <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G142>take<s%> it away: and he that is in the <S%G68>field,<s%> let him <S%G3668>likewise<s%> not <S%G1994>return<s%> back. <S%G3694><s%>
<S%G3421>Remember<s%> Lot's wife. <S%G1135><s%>

Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> it; and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G2225>preserve<s%> it.

I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, in that <S%G3571>night<s%> there shall be two <S%G1417><s%> men in <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2825>bed;<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> shall be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> shall be left. <S%G863><s%>

Two <S%G1417><s%> women shall be <S%G229>grinding<s%> together; <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3391>one<s%> shall be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> left. <S%G863><s%>
Two <S%G1417><s%> men shall be in the <S%G68>field;<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> shall be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> left. <S%G863><s%>

And they <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4226>Where,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord?<s%> And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3699>Wherever<s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> is, <S%G1563>thither<s%> will the <S%G105>eagles<s%> be <S%G4863>gathered<s%> together. <S%G4863><s%>
